scenes.action_text: THE DEBT Written by Matthew Vaughn, Jane Goldman & Peter Straughan 1 INT. CARGO PLANE. MILITARY AIRBASE. ISRAEL - DAY 1 A strange ROARING sound... CLOSE ON A YOUNG WOMAN ...in darkness. Light begins to spill on her from the right - revealing her face, lost in thought. This is RACHEL SINGER - pretty, painfully young looking. A surgical dressing covers half her face. As we pull back a little we see that two YOUNG MEN sit ei
